verses.verse: וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מְגוּרֵ֣י <S%H4033><s%> was a stranger אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> wherein his father בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> These תֹּלְד֣וֹת <S%H8435><s%> These [are] the generations יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob יוֹסֵ֞ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁבַֽע־ <S%H7651><s%> seven עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become רֹעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> was feeding אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> with his brethren בַּצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נַ֗עַר <S%H5288><s%> and the lad אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [was] with the sons בִלְהָ֛ה <S%H1090><s%> of Bilhah וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and with the sons זִלְפָּ֖ה <S%H2153><s%> of Zilpah נְשֵׁ֣י <S%H802><s%> wives אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father's וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> brought יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבָּתָ֥ם <S%H1681><s%> report רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> their evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> unto his father

וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Now Israel אָהַ֤ב <S%H157><s%> loved אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> Joseph מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> more than all his children כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> because he [was] the son זְקֻנִ֥ים <S%H2208><s%> of his old age ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ל֑וֹ וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and he made ל֖וֹ כְּתֹ֥נֶת <S%H3801><s%> him a coat פַּסִּֽים׃ <S%H6446><s%> of [many] colours

וַיִּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw אֶחָ֗יו <S%H251><s%> And when his brethren כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֹת֞וֹ <S%H853><s%> אָהַ֤ב <S%H157><s%> loved אֲבִיהֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> that their father מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> him more than all his brethren וַֽיִּשְׂנְא֖וּ <S%H8130><s%> they hated אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> him and could דַּבְּר֥וֹ <S%H1696><s%> not speak לְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <S%H7965><s%> peaceably

וַיַּחֲלֹ֤ם <S%H2492><s%> dreamed יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph חֲל֔וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <S%H5046><s%> and he told לְאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> [it] his brethren וַיּוֹסִ֥פוּ <S%H3254><s%> him yet the more ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> even שְׂנֹ֥א <S%H8130><s%> and they hated אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> unto them Hear נָ֕א <S%H4994><s%> Please הַחֲל֥וֹם <S%H2492><s%> which I have dreamed הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> to this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָלָֽמְתִּי׃ <S%H2492><s%> have had

וְ֠הִנֵּה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we מְאַלְּמִ֤ים <S%H481><s%> were binding אֲלֻמִּים֙ <S%H485><s%> sheaves בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> hope הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and lo קָ֥מָה <S%H6965><s%> arose אֲלֻמָּתִ֖י <S%H485><s%> and lo my sheaf וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also נִצָּ֑בָה <S%H5324><s%> and also stood upright וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold תְסֻבֶּ֙ינָה֙ <S%H5437><s%> stood round about אֲלֻמֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H485><s%> and behold your sheaves וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖יןָ <S%H7812><s%> and made obeisance לַאֲלֻמָּתִֽי׃ <S%H485><s%> to my sheaf

וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> And his brethren הֲמָלֹ֤ךְ <S%H4427><s%> to him Shalt thou indeed תִּמְלֹךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> reign עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or מָשׁ֥וֹל <S%H4910><s%> over us? or shalt thou indeed תִּמְשֹׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> have dominion בָּ֑נוּ וַיּוֹסִ֤פוּ <S%H3254><s%> him yet the more עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> even שְׂנֹ֣א <S%H8130><s%> over us? And they hated אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over חֲלֹמֹתָ֖יו <S%H2472><s%> for his dreams וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <S%H1697><s%> and for his words

וַיַּחֲלֹ֥ם <S%H2492><s%> And he dreamed עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> still חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> dream אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> yet another וַיְסַפֵּ֥ר <S%H5608><s%> and told אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> it his brethren וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Lo חָלַ֤מְתִּֽי <S%H2492><s%> Behold I have dreamed חֲלוֹם֙ <S%H2472><s%> a dream ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> more and behold the sun וְהַיָּרֵ֗חַ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon וְאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> a עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten כּֽוֹכָבִ֔ים <S%H3556><s%> stars מִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֖ים <S%H7812><s%> made obeisance לִֽי׃

וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> And he told אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָבִיו֮ <S%H1><s%> [it] to his father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אֶחָיו֒ <S%H251><s%> and to his brethren וַיִּגְעַר־ <S%H1605><s%> rebuked בּ֣וֹ אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> and his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said ל֔וֹ מָ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> What הַחֲל֥וֹם <S%H2472><s%> unto him What [is] this dream הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that חָלָ֑מְתָּ <S%H2492><s%> that thou hast dreamed הֲב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> indeed נָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> come אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I וְאִמְּךָ֣ <S%H517><s%> ? Shall I and thy mother וְאַחֶ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> and thy brethren לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֥ת <S%H7812><s%> to bow down לְךָ֖ אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> common

וַיְקַנְאוּ־ <S%H7065><s%> envied ב֖וֹ אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> And his brethren וְאָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> him but his father שָׁמַ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> observed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> the saying

וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> And his brethren לִרְע֛וֹת <S%H7462><s%> to feed אֶׅתׅ־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> flock אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> their father's בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7927><s%> in Shechem

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> are not אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> Do not thy brethren רֹעִ֣ים <S%H7462><s%> feed בִּשְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> Shechem לְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> and I וְאֶשְׁלָחֲךָ֣ <S%H7971><s%> and I will send thee אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto them And he said ל֖וֹ הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> will go

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said ל֗וֹ לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> Go נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> now רְאֵ֜ה <S%H7200><s%> I pray thee see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> whether it be well אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> with thy brethren וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and well הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> with the flocks וַהֲשִׁבֵ֖נִי <S%H7725><s%> again דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> me word וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> So he sent מֵעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> him out of the vale חֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and he came שְׁכֶֽמָה׃ <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem

וַיִּמְצָאֵ֣הוּ <S%H4672><s%> found him אִ֔ישׁ <S%H582><s%> him וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold תֹעֶ֖ה <S%H8582><s%> and behold [he was] wandering בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֧הוּ <S%H7592><s%> asked him הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What תְּבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> What seekest

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחַ֖י <S%H251><s%> my brethren אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <S%H1245><s%> I seek הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please לִ֔י אֵיפֹ֖ה <S%H375><s%> me I pray thee where הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they רֹעִֽים׃ <S%H7462><s%> they feed

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And the man נָסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> They are departed מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> hence כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> for I heard אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> them say נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> go דֹּתָ֑יְנָה <S%H1886><s%> to Dothan וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> after אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וַיִּמְצָאֵ֖ם <S%H4672><s%> and found בְּדֹתָֽן׃ <S%H1886><s%> them in Dothan

וַיִּרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> And when they saw אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מֵרָחֹ֑ק <S%H7350><s%> him afar off וּבְטֶ֙רֶם֙ <S%H2962><s%> and before יִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> even before he came near אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to וַיִּֽתְנַכְּל֥וּ <S%H5230><s%> unto them they conspired אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> against him to slay

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> to another הִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> Here בַּ֛עַל <S%H1167><s%> archer הַחֲלֹמ֥וֹת <S%H2472><s%> dream הַלָּזֶ֖ה <S%H1976><s%> Behold this בָּֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> cometh

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> Now לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> come וְנַֽהַרְגֵ֗הוּ <S%H2026><s%> now therefore and let us slay וְנַשְׁלִכֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7993><s%> him and cast בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> him into some הַבֹּר֔וֹת <S%H953><s%> pit וְאָמַ֕רְנוּ <S%H559><s%> and we will say חַיָּ֥ה <S%H2416><s%> beast רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> Some evil אֲכָלָ֑תְהוּ <S%H398><s%> hath devoured וְנִרְאֶ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> him and we shall see מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become חֲלֹמֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H2472><s%> what will become of his dreams

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> And Reuben וַיַּצִּלֵ֖הוּ <S%H5337><s%> [it] and he delivered מִיָּדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> him out of their hands וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נַכֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H5221><s%> take נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> his life

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H413><s%> about רְאוּבֵן֮ <S%H7205><s%> And Reuben אַל־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִּשְׁפְּכוּ־ <S%H8210><s%> unto them Shed דָם֒ <S%H1818><s%> no blood הַשְׁלִ֣יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> [but] cast אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַבּ֤וֹר <S%H953><s%> him into this pit הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> is in בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> that [is] in the wilderness וְיָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> no hand אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תִּשְׁלְחוּ־ <S%H7971><s%> and lay ב֑וֹ לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> might הַצִּ֤יל <S%H5337><s%> upon him that he might rid אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> מִיָּדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> him out of their hands לַהֲשִׁיב֖וֹ <S%H7725><s%> again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> him to his father

וַֽיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> was come יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And it came to pass when Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren וַיַּפְשִׁ֤יטוּ <S%H6584><s%> stripped אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֻּתָּנְתּ֔וֹ <S%H3801><s%> his coat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּתֹ֥נֶת <S%H3801><s%> [his] coat הַפַּסִּ֖ים <S%H6446><s%> of [many] colours אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and they

וַיִּ֨קָּחֻ֔הוּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took וַיַּשְׁלִ֥כוּ <S%H7993><s%> him and cast אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַבֹּ֑רָה <S%H953><s%> him into a pit וְהַבּ֣וֹר <S%H953><s%> and the pit רֵ֔ק <S%H7386><s%> [was] empty אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without בּ֖וֹ מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> [there was] no water

וַיֵּשְׁבוּ֮ <S%H3427><s%> And they sat down לֶֽאֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> to eat לֶחֶם֒ <S%H3899><s%> bread וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> and they lifted up עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> their eyes וַיִּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold אֹרְחַ֣ת <S%H736><s%> and behold a company יִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים <S%H3459><s%> of Ishmeelites בָּאָ֖ה <S%H935><s%> came מִגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> from Gilead וּגְמַלֵּיהֶ֣ם <S%H1581><s%> with their camels נֹֽשְׂאִ֗ים <S%H5375><s%> bearing נְכֹאת֙ <S%H5219><s%> spicery וּצְרִ֣י <S%H6875><s%> and balm וָלֹ֔ט <S%H3910><s%> and myrrh הוֹלְכִ֖ים <S%H1980><s%> going לְהוֹרִ֥יד <S%H3381><s%> to carry [it] down מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What בֶּ֗צַע <S%H1215><s%> What profit כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נַהֲרֹג֙ <S%H2026><s%> [is it] if we slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֔ינוּ <S%H251><s%> our brother וְכִסִּ֖ינוּ <S%H3680><s%> and conceal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמֽוֹ׃ <S%H1818><s%> bloodshed

לְכ֞וּ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנִמְכְּרֶ֣נּוּ <S%H4376><s%> and let us sell לַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים <S%H3459><s%> him to the Ishmeelites וְיָדֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3027><s%> and let not our hand אַל־ <S%H408><s%> and not תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> lay ב֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָחִ֥ינוּ <S%H251><s%> be upon him for he [is] our brother בְשָׂרֵ֖נוּ <S%H1320><s%> [and] our flesh ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> were content אֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> And his brethren

וַיַּֽעַבְרוּ֩ <S%H5674><s%> Then there passed אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> some מִדְיָנִ֜ים <S%H4084><s%> by Midianites סֹֽחֲרִ֗ים <S%H5503><s%> traders וַֽיִּמְשְׁכוּ֙ <S%H4900><s%> and they drew וַיַּֽעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> and lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> Joseph מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַבּ֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> out of the pit וַיִּמְכְּר֧וּ <S%H4376><s%> and sold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph לַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֖ים <S%H3459><s%> to the Ishmeelites בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> for twenty כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> And Reuben אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַבּ֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> unto the pit וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> else יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> and behold Joseph בַּבּ֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> [was] not in the pit וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <S%H7167><s%> and he rent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָֽיו׃ <S%H899><s%> his clothes

וַיָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> And he returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said הַיֶּ֣לֶד <S%H3206><s%> The child אֵינֶ֔נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> me אָ֥נָה <S%H575><s%> [is] not and I whither אֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> shall I בָֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> shall I go

וַיִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּתֹ֣נֶת <S%H3801><s%> coat יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph's וַֽיִּשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <S%H7819><s%> and killed שְׂעִ֣יר <S%H8163><s%> a kid עִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats וַיִּטְבְּל֥וּ <S%H2881><s%> and dipped אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֻּתֹּ֖נֶת <S%H3801><s%> the coat בַּדָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> in the blood

וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֞וּ <S%H7971><s%> And they sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּתֹ֣נֶת <S%H3801><s%> the coat הַפַּסִּ֗ים <S%H6446><s%> of [many] colours וַיָּבִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> [it] to their father וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and said זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> We מָצָ֑אנוּ <S%H4672><s%> This have we found הַכֶּר־ <S%H5234><s%> know נָ֗א <S%H4994><s%> please הַכְּתֹ֧נֶת <S%H3801><s%> coat בִּנְךָ֛ <S%H1121><s%> now whether it [be] thy son's הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> not

וַיַּכִּירָ֤הּ <S%H5234><s%> And he knew it וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said כְּתֹ֣נֶת <S%H3801><s%> coat בְּנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> [It is] my son's חַיָּ֥ה <S%H2416><s%> beast רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> an evil אֲכָלָ֑תְהוּ <S%H398><s%> hath devoured טָרֹ֥ף <S%H2963><s%> is without doubt טֹרַ֖ף <S%H2963><s%> rent in pieces יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> him Joseph

וַיִּקְרַ֤ע <S%H7167><s%> rent יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob שִׂמְלֹתָ֔יו <S%H8071><s%> his clothes וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put שַׂ֖ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> upon his loins וַיִּתְאַבֵּ֥ל <S%H56><s%> and mourned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> for his son יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> many

וַיָּקֻמוּ֩ <S%H6965><s%> rose up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּנָ֨יו <S%H1121><s%> And all his sons וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּנֹתָ֜יו <S%H1323><s%> and all his daughters לְנַחֲמ֗וֹ <S%H5162><s%> to comfort וַיְמָאֵן֙ <S%H3985><s%> him but he refused לְהִתְנַחֵ֔ם <S%H5162><s%> to be comforted וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely אֵרֵ֧ד <S%H3381><s%> For I will go down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנִ֛י <S%H1121><s%> unto my son אָבֵ֖ל <S%H57><s%> mourning שְׁאֹ֑לָה <S%H7585><s%> into the grave וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> wept אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> Thus his father

וְהַ֨מְּדָנִ֔ים <S%H4084><s%> the Midianites מָכְר֥וּ <S%H4376><s%> sold אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> him into Egypt לְפֽוֹטִיפַר֙ <S%H6318><s%> unto Potiphar סְרִ֣יס <S%H5631><s%> an officer פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh's שַׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> [and] captain הַטַּבָּחִֽים׃ <S%H2876><s%> of the guard פ
